sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const InventoryManagement = () => { const [inventoryStats, setInventoryStats] = useState({ totalPO: 0, finishedPO: 0, pendingPO: 0, totalClientOrders: 0, finishedClientOrders: 0, pendingClientOrders: 0, }) const [poDetails, setPODetails] = useState([]) const [batchSlips, setBatchSlips] = useState([]) const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { fetchInventoryData() }, []) const fetchInventoryData = async () => { try { setLoading(true) // Fetch inventory statistics const statsResponse = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/inventory-stats") const statsData = await statsResponse.json() setInventoryStats(statsData) // Fetch PO details const poResponse = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/po") const poData = await poResponse.json() setPODetails(poData) // Fetch batch slips const batchResponse = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/batch-slips") const batchData = await batchResponse.json() setBatchSlips(batchData) // Fetch invoices const invoiceResponse = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/invoices") const invoiceData = await invoiceResponse.json() setInvoices(invoiceData) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching inventory data:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const exportToExcel = () => { const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() // Add inventory stats sheet const statsSheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet([inventoryStats]) XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, statsSheet, "Inventory Stats") // Add PO details sheet const poSheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(poDetails) XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, poSheet, "PO Details") // Add batch slips sheet const batchSheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(batchSlips) XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, batchSheet, "Batch Slips") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "inventory_management.xlsx") } const calculatePOProgress = () => { if (inventoryStats.totalPO === 0) return 0 return Math.round((inventoryStats.finishedPO / inventoryStats.totalPO) * 100) } const calculateClientOrderProgress = () => { if (inventoryStats.totalClientOrders === 0) return 0 return Math.round((inventoryStats.finishedClientOrders / inventoryStats.totalClientOrders) * 100) } if (loading) { return (

Loading inventory data...

) } return (
📦

Inventory Management

Purchase Orders

📋
{calculatePOProgress()}%
Total PO: {inventoryStats.totalPO}
Finished: {inventoryStats.finishedPO}
Pending: {inventoryStats.pendingPO}

Client Orders

🏗️
{calculateClientOrderProgress()}%
Total Orders: {inventoryStats.totalClientOrders}
Finished: {inventoryStats.finishedClientOrders}
Pending: {inventoryStats.pendingClientOrders}

Recent Purchase Orders

{poDetails.slice(0, 10).map((po) => ( ))}
PO Number Supplier Material Quantity Total Amount Status Delivery Date
{po.po_number} {po.supplier} {po.material} {po.quantity} ₹{Number.parseFloat(po.total_amount).toLocaleString()} {po.status} {new Date(po.delivery_date).toLocaleDateString()}

Recent Batch Slips

{batchSlips.slice(0, 10).map((batch) => ( ))}
Batch Number Customer Recipe Code Quantity Batch Date Status
{batch.batch_number} {batch.customer} {batch.recipe_code} {batch.quantity} {new Date(batch.batch_date).toLocaleDateString()} Active

Inventory Alerts

{inventoryStats.pendingPO > 0 && (
⚠️

Pending Purchase Orders

{inventoryStats.pendingPO} purchase orders are still pending completion

)} {inventoryStats.pendingClientOrders > 0 && (
ℹ️

Pending Client Orders

{inventoryStats.pendingClientOrders} client orders are awaiting processing

)} {inventoryStats.pendingPO === 0 && inventoryStats.pendingClientOrders === 0 && (
✅

All Orders Up to Date

No pending orders or alerts at this time

)}
) } export default InventoryManagement
